comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Not sure if this is the right ship, launched in 1924 in Cockatoo Dockyards to service Australian Lighthouses - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/16206941

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Resident expert advises that the vessel in this image matches the description of the newspaper article and that this IS the 1924 CAPE LEEUWIN. A later 'Cape' vessel, CAPE DON, is on the museum's register of historic vessels.
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
